context_bundle.summary: Elasticsearch distributed search and analytics engine: Full-text search, structured search, aggregations, real-time analytics. JSON documents in indexes (inverted index). Query DSL: match, term, range, bool. Aggregations: metrics, buckets (histogram, terms). ELK Stack: Elasticsearch (search/storage), Logstash (ingestion), Kibana (visualization). Use cases: log analytics, search engines, metrics, security (SIEM). Performance: horizontal scaling, sharding, replication.

onboarding.quick_start: Elasticsearch basics: Indexes (like databases), documents (JSON), inverted index for fast search. Index: POST /users/_doc {"name": "John", "email": "john@example.com"}. Search: GET /users/_search {"query": {"match": {"name": "John"}}}. Term query (exact): {"term": {"status": "active"}}. Bool query: {"bool": {"must": [{"match": {...}}], "filter": [{"range": {...}}]}}. Aggregations: {"aggs": {"by_status": {"terms": {"field": "status"}}}}. ELK: Logstash (ingest) -> Elasticsearch (index) -> Kibana (visualize). Use for: logs, search, metrics, SIEM. Sharding for scale, replication for HA.
common_patterns: ELK Stack: Logstash -> Elasticsearch -> Kibana dashboards
Mapping: define field types (text, keyword, date, integer)
Sharding: primary shards + replica shards for scale and HA
